para: OOF.Mesh.Boundary_Conditions.Copy copies a existing boundary condition. It can be copied from one boundary to another within a &mesh;, or to a completely different &mesh;.
The current parameter is the name of the &mesh; from which the boundary condition will be copied. The mesh parameter is the name of the &mesh; to which it will be copied.

The name must be unique among all of the boundary condition names in the target &mesh;. If it is not unique, then <x> will be appended to it, where x is a suitable integer. If the name is , a name will be assigned automatically.
The boundary parameter specifies the boundary to which the copied boundary condition will apply. It must be the name of an existing boundary in the &skel; of the target &mesh;.
